name: A Roaring Affair
description:
Aimee and her family run the Starry Troupe, a world-renowned group of circus performers. When a skirmish happens onstage during one of their performances, their trusted lion Henri is accused of attacking a rich noblewoman.

 With her dad and lion arrested for a crime she knows they didn't commit, Aimee decides to get to the bottom of what exactly happened. Play as Aimee as she teams up with one of two men as she investigates in order to save her family!

This game was made for Otome Jam 2022.

  • A haughty man you can tease
  • A big guy with a tiny baby chick on his shoulder
  • A big cuddly lion
  • 30,000  words
  • 5 CGs and 5 cut-in CGs
  • 6 unique backgrounds
  • 3 endings (one must be unlocked)

THE STARRY TROUPE TEAM

  • Heiden: writing, programming, editing
  • Green-Glasses: sprites, CG, UI art
  • z04: background art
  • Helen: beta reader

Background music is royalty-free.
